text: 9:12 Matyu 14:15; Mak 6:35-36; Jon 6:5Bar guaratɨzimɨn Iesusɨn 12plan aposelba a bagha izegha kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “E gumazamiziba puvatɨzir danganimɨn iti. Nɨ gumazamiziba amadaghtɨ, me danganir kamɨn itir nguibaba ko nguibar roghɨra itibar mangɨva, uari bagh dagheba ko dakuamin danganiba buri.”
